content.p: Securing sustainable food supplies, ending slavery, developing greener transport, and reducing our reliance on fossil reserves are just some of the solutions to the pressing problems we face. We are funding six new Beacons of Excellence committed to tackling these global challenges. A community with a shared vision of ending slavery in our lifetime. Transforming healthcare with pioneering imaging. Addressing the challenge of feeding an ever growing world population. At the heart of a revolution in greener transport; electrified propulsion. Securing the sustainable bio-economy of the future. Technology research to make smarter and trusted products for everyone.
